title: Peter's Arrest
description:
Enjoy this Lego retelling of Peter's Arrest.

This video is part of a larger series, called The Kings Family look at my other torrents to see the rest, or click on the, The Kings Family, tag to see the other videos in the series.
Lego group does not endorse, or probably even know that this video exists, the Lego name and product is used without permission, though according to their website we don't need permission to use either, so long as we follow some guidelines, like telling you that they don't endorse this video, though if they saw it, I bet they would. :)

LEGO(R) is a trademark of the LEGO Group of companies which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this video.
This video can be found on youtube, just do a google search for The Bible Animated The Kings Family

Format: MP4
File Size: 96.6
